View Logs

This interface allows you to view the various logs that are written by DokuWiki. By default, there shouldn't be much here (it depends on your log settings). However if something goes wrong, chances are high you'll find useful information about the problem. All times are UTC!

Please be aware that log files can contain sensitive information like passwords, paths or other secrets. Be sure to redact the logs appropriately when posting them on the forum or in bug reports!
